name: Nihan Kesim Cicekli
content: Nihan Kesim Çiçekli Nihan Kesim Çiçekli Professor, Ph.D. Department of Computer Engineering, Middle East Technical University, Ankara, Turkey. E-mail: nihan@ceng.metu.edu.tr Phone: (90-312) 210 55 82 Fax: (90-312) 210 55 44 Education  (C.V.) Ph.D.   Department of Computing, Imperial College, University of London, 1993. M.Sc.  Department of Computer Engineering and Information Science, Bilkent University, 1988. B.Sc.   Department of Computer Engineering, Middle East Technical University, 1986. Research Areas Multimedia information retrieval: semantic content-based modeling, storage and querying, semantic indexing Recommender Systems: graph-based models, hybrid recommendation systems Semantic Web: ontology based data management, reasoning, web services composition Event Calculus, temporal reasoning, logic programming, knowledge representation. Research Intelligent Systems Laboratory (ISL) Publications Sponsored Projects Graduate Students Teaching CENG 213 Data Structures CENG 301 Algorithms and Data Structures CENG 302 Introduction to Database Management Systems CENG 351 Data Management and File Structures CENG 352 Database Management Systems CENG 424 Logic in Computer Science CENG 556 Distributed Database Systems CENG 553 Database Management Systems CENG 707 Data Structures and Algorithms CENG 776 Information Retrieval Useful Links Miscellenous
